queryString:
// HalCodeAnalyzerで作成したメソッド呼び出し関係のグラフ化
MATCH (c1:Class)-[:HAS_CHILD]->(:Method)-[:CALLS]->(:Method)<-[:HAS_CHILD]-(c2:Class)
WITH DISTINCT c1, c2
OPTIONAL match path1 = (c1)<-[r1:HAS_CHILD*]-()
OPTIONAL match path2 = (c2)<-[r2:HAS_CHILD*]-()
WHERE	ALL(n IN nodes(path2) WHERE n.name <> 'Util')
AND		ALL(n IN nodes(path2) WHERE n.name <> 'AggregateMemberTypes')
WITH DISTINCT c1, c2, r1, r2, nodes(path1) as cn1, nodes(path2) as cn2
//CALL apoc.create.vRelationship(c1,'CALL',{},c2) YIELD depends
WITH
  //  depends,
	r1 + r2 as parentChild,
	[n in cn1 + cn2 WHERE n.name <> 'Nijo'] as classAndNamespaces
RETURN parentChild, classAndNamespaces
